The image was manipulated: The expert's verdict states that the image in question has been manipulated, indicating that it has been altered or edited in some way.
Original photo evidence: The expert mentions that the original photo was taken by Associated Press photographer Pablo Martinez Monsivais on March 25, 2012. This original photo shows Barack Obama looking through the correct end of the binoculars, contradicting the claim.
Multiple angles: Getty Images has other photos from the same day, taken from different angles. None of these photos show Obama holding the binoculars incorrectly, further discrediting the claim.
Facebook: s efforts to combat false news: The expert mentions that the post was flagged as part of Facebook's efforts to combat false news and misinformation on its platform. This suggests that Facebook has mechanisms in place to verify the authenticity of claims and identify false information.
